instructions.step2: Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
instructions.step3: Spread pizza sauce over the dough.
instructions.step6: Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes until the crust is golden brown.

instructions.step1: Chop lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and any other desired vegetables.
instructions.step2: Place chopped vegetables in a large bowl.
instructions.step3: Add dressing and toss to combine.

instructions.step2: Wash and peel the sweet potato.
instructions.step3: Cut the sweet potato into cubes.
instructions.step4: Place the cubes on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.
instructions.step5: Roast in the oven for 25-30 minutes until tender.

instructions.step1: Boil a large pot of salted water.
instructions.step2: Add gnocchi to the boiling water.
instructions.step3: Cook until the gnocchi float to the surface, about 2-3 minutes.
instructions.step4: Drain and serve with your favorite sauce.

instructions.step2: Season the roast with salt and pepper.
instructions.step3: Heat oil in a large pot and brown the roast on all sides.
instructions.step4: Add onions, carrots, and potatoes to the pot.
instructions.step5: Pour in beef broth and bring to a simmer.
instructions.step6: Cover and transfer to the oven. Cook for 3-4 hours until the meat is tender.

instructions.step2: Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
instructions.step3: Brown ground beef in a pan and add tomato sauce.
instructions.step4: In a bowl, mix ricotta cheese, egg, and Parmesan cheese.
instructions.step5: Layer noodles, meat sauce, and cheese mixture in a baking dish.
instructions.step6: Top with mozzarella cheese and bake for 45 minutes until bubbly.

instructions.step1: Form ground beef into a patty.
instructions.step2: Season the patty with salt and pepper.
instructions.step3: Grill the patty over medium-high heat for 4-5 minutes per side.
instructions.step4: Place the patty on a hamburger bun and add desired toppings.

instructions.step1: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
instructions.step2: In a wok, heat oil and cook chicken until done.
instructions.step3: Add garlic, tofu, and shrimp and stir-fry.
instructions.step4: Push ingredients to the side and scramble an egg in the wok.
instructions.step5: Add cooked noodles, sauce, and mix well.
instructions.step6: Garnish with peanuts, bean sprouts, and lime wedges.

instructions.step1: Measure out a serving of almonds.
instructions.step2: Serve as a snack or add to salads or yogurt.

instructions.step1: Soak rice in water for 30 minutes.
instructions.step2: Mix ground meat, rice, onions, and spices.
instructions.step3: Place a small amount of mixture on a cabbage leaf and roll tightly.
instructions.step4: Place rolls in a pot and cover with water.
instructions.step5: Simmer for 2 hours until cooked through.

instructions.step1: Preheat a skillet over medium heat.
instructions.step2: Place bacon strips in the skillet.
instructions.step4: Drain on paper towels before serving.

instructions.step1: Heat a pot of water to boiling.
instructions.step2: Add hot dog to the boiling water and cook for 5 minutes.
instructions.step3: Place hot dog in a bun and add desired toppings.

instructions.step2: In a bowl, mix pumpkin puree, sugar, and oil.
instructions.step4: Stir in flour, baking soda, and spices.
instructions.step5: Pour batter into a greased loaf pan.
instructions.step6: Bake for 60-70 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.

instructions.step2: In a bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt.
instructions.step3: Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla extract. Beat until smooth.
instructions.step4: Pour batter into a greased cake pan.
instructions.step5: Bake for 30-35 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.

instructions.step2: In a bowl, mix whole wheat flour, yeast, and salt.
instructions.step3: Add warm water and knead until smooth.
instructions.step5: Shape dough into a loaf and place in a greased pan.
instructions.step6: Bake for 30-35 minutes until golden brown.

instructions.step2: Separate the orange into segments.
instructions.step3: Serve as a snack or add to a salad.

instructions.step1: Chill an ice cream maker bowl in the freezer.
instructions.step2: In a bowl, combine heavy cream, milk, sugar, and peppermint extract.
instructions.step3: Pour the mixture into the ice cream maker.
instructions.step4: Churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.

instructions.step2: Eat as a snack or slice and add to cereal or yogurt.
Stir if needed and enjoy as is or add fruits and granola.
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
instructions.step3: Spread tomato sauce over the dough.
instructions.step4: Add slices of fresh mozzarella cheese.
instructions.step5: Place fresh basil leaves on top.
instructions.step6: Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes until the crust is golden brown.
